doc.field: ability to change it or slow it down, now they can't believe they're coming for their drinking straws. they think they are blameless in all of this. can you tell them that four years of lost effort is or is not going to impact our overall climate change cost to both economic and humans? because clearly for four years we're just going to suspend any efforts in that area. yeah, well, of course, no, i can't tell them that because it's true. the four-year hiatus is a problem. we need to be acting and we need to be acting quickly on this. if we do so, it's not just danger. there are tremendous dangers, of course, from climate change, but
